[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-datasource-protocol](./harp-datasource-protocol.md) &gt; [ImageTexture](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.md)

## ImageTexture interface

Can be used to create a texture atlas.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ImageTexture 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [flipH](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.fliph.md) | boolean | Defaults to false. |
|  [flipV](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.flipv.md) | boolean | Defaults to false. |
|  [height](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.height.md) | number | Specify sub-region: Defaults to 0, meaning height is taken from loaded image. |
|  [image](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.image.md) | string | Name of ImageDefinition to use. |
|  [name](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.name.md) | string | Name of ImageTexture. Used to reference texture in the styles. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.opacity.md) | number | Defaults to 1. |
|  [origin](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.origin.md) | string | Origin of image, defaults to "topleft" |
|  [width](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.width.md) | number | Specify sub-region: Defaults to 0, meaning width is taken from loaded image. |
|  [xOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.xoffset.md) | number | Specify sub-region: Defaults to 0. |
|  [yOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.yoffset.md) | number | Specify sub-region: Defaults to 0. |
